roleset.name: try
roleset.note: ATTEMPT-V NOTES: Member of Vncls try-61. Comparison with 'try'. (from attempt.01-v)
ATTEMPT-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-9998. Comparison to attempt.01-v. VN class try-61. FN class attempt. Framed by Katie. (from attempt.01-n)

example.name: sentential attempt
example.text: Mr. Nichol said he was ``extremely disappointed in the continuing deterioration of the company's operations while it attempted to conclude the reorganization during the past four months.''
example.arg: to conclude the reorganization during the past four months

example.name: nominal attempt
example.text: Investment bankers following UAL agree that the strongest impetus for an eventual deal is that the pilots have been attempting a buy-out for more than two years, and aren't likely to stop, having come so close to success.

example.name: autogen2
example.text: an attempt to speed deficit-reduction through Congress

example.name: One more with both args
example.text: Congress' attempt to deny the president the funding necessary to execute certain of his duties and prerogatives specified in Article II of the Constitution.
example.arg: to deny the president the funding necessary to execute certain of his duties and prerogatives specified in Article II of the Constitution.
